verses.verse: <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> one <S%H1121>year<s%>; and when he had <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; whereof two <S%H505>thousand<s%> were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> and in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el, and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> were with <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>: and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H168>tent<s%>.

And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that was in <S%H1387>Geba<s%>, and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H7586>it<s%>. And Saul <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

And all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> a <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also was had in <S%H887>abomination<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> were called <S%H6817>together<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H5971>people<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> which is on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore<s%> in <S%H7230>multitude<s%>: and they came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash<s%>, <S%H6926>eastward<s%> from <S%H1007>Beth<s%>–aven.

When the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were in a <S%H6887>narrow<s%>, (for the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5065>distressed<s%>,) then the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves in <S%H4631>caves<s%>, and in <S%H2337>thickets<s%>, and in <S%H5553>rocks<s%>, and in high <S%H6877>places<s%>, and in <S%H953>pits<s%>.

And some of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> went <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>. As for <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, he was yet in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> him <S%H2729>trembling<s%>.

And he <S%H3176>stayed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, according to the set <S%H4150>time<s%> that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> had <S%H8050>appointed<s%>: but Samuel <S%H935>came<s%> not to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> were scattered from <S%H6327>him<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Bring <S%H5066>here<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H8002>me<s%>, and peace offerings. And he <S%H5927>offered<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3615>pass<s%>, that as soon as he had made an end of <S%H5927>offering<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, <S%H8050>behold<s%>, Samuel <S%H935>came<s%>; and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1288>him<s%>, that he might greet him.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What have you <S%H6213>done<s%>? And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Because I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5310>scattered<s%> from <S%H935>me<s%>, and that you came not inside the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4150>appointed<s%>, and that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%> at <S%H4363>Michmash<s%>;

Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6430>I<s%>, The Philistines will come <S%H3381>down<s%> now upon me to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and I have not made <S%H2470>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: I <S%H662>forced<s%> myself <S%H5927>therefore<s%>, and offered a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, You have done <S%H5528>foolishly<s%>: you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>: for now would the Lord have <S%H3559>established<s%> your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

But now your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall not <S%H6965>continue<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1245>sought<s%> him a <S%H376>man<s%> after his own <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to be <S%H5057>captain<s%> over his <S%H5971>people<s%>, because you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> that which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and gat him <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> unto <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> with <S%H8337>him<s%>, about six <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> with <S%H3427>them<s%>, lived in <S%H1387>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>: but the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash<s%>.

And the <S%H7843>spoilers<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> unto the <S%H1870>way<s%> that leads to <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7777>Shual<s%>:

And <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1032>Beth<s%>–horon: and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> to the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> that <S%H8259>looks<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H6650>Zeboim<s%> toward the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

Now there was no <S%H2796>smith<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Lest the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H2719>swords<s%> or <S%H2595>spears<s%>:

But all the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, to <S%H3913>sharpen<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4282>share<s%>, and his <S%H855>coulter<s%>, and his <S%H7134>axe<s%>, and his <S%H4281>mattock<s%>.

Yet they had a <S%H6477>file<s%> for the <S%H4281>mattocks<s%>, and for the <S%H855>coulters<s%>, and for the <S%H7969>forks<s%>, and for the <S%H7134>axes<s%>, and to <S%H5324>sharpen<s%> the <S%H1861>goads<s%>.

So it came to pass in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%>, that there was neither <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of any of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>: but with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and with <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> was there <S%H4672>found<s%>.
And the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4569>passage<s%> of <S%H4363>Michmash<s%>.
